alert.note: Alert for Monroe Middle Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 3:35AM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Middle Keys in Monroe County through 400 AM EST... At 334 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pidgeon Key, or over Seven Mile Bridge, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marathon, East End Of Seven Mile Bridge, Seven Mile Bridge, West End Of Seven Mile Bridge, Boot Key, Knight Key and Pidgeon Key. This includes US 1 between mile markers 40 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
